item.description:
If you have never seen a dance floor full of tall people, you have never experienced a Beanstalks Dance!! If you aren't used to it, it is quite amazing to be among a large group of other folks who are tall like YOU!

Tonight you can join another local Boston organization for Talls - The Boston Beanstalks Tall Club - at their Summer Dance Party on Saturday July 14, 2012, at the Newton Marriott on Route 30 in West Newton (just off Rt 128/I-95).

The BBTC has been dancing up a storm at their Annual weekends for a lot of years - and 2012 will be no exception.
So get yourselves down there, and get ready to party hearty & boogie your b_tts off
to the tunes of a
LIVE R&B , Funk & Mowtown Dance Band - The Dave Macklin Band!

**** This is a public event, open to all adults 21+ regardless of height ****

**** So bring buddies/friends/colleagues to join in the fun! ****

The dance starts at 8:00 pm and it costs $20 at the door.

COME ON DOWN AND MEET SOME NEW TALL FRIENDS!

Any questions, please contact the event hosts, via e-mail.
item.how_to_find_us: Check the hotel's event/function listing for the ballroom
item.name: Summer Dance Party with LIVE Band at the Marriott in Newton
